title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Savings Banks, Supervisory Policy 1 - Authorization of Trust Powers for Savings Banks
content:

§ 1.2 - General criteria, version 5
§ 1.3 - Specific requirements, version 3

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Savings Banks, Supervisory Policy 1

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 14[1], 234-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
